price: 3. "When we are dead and have become dust (shall we be resurrected?) That is a far return."
arabic: أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗاۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجۡعُۢ بَعِيدٞ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: a-idhā mit'nā wakunnā turāban dhālika rajʿun baʿīdun
